name: Currus
description:
Hi,

I present to you my game called Currus. It's a car game that I've been programming for 3 years. I focus on physics and complex systems like complete fuel management, engine heating, damage ... Today on BetaTest 2 is available and I invite you to try it out and tell me what you think about it on Itch.io and GameJolt or Youtube. You can also follow the progress of the game on Youtube on video or follow the progress of the game on GameJolt. Today on my BetaTest 2 you can go to the Monza circuit to try to break time records! We can also find the usual FreeZone. You can also choose 6 cars from different ranges, choose the quantity of fuel you want in your car, the temperature of the track ... And many other things !! So don't hesitate any longer! Play !

Beta Test 2 is paying ( 4.99 €  ~  6.00 $ ) because in its future development the game will need some important updates . And also it allows me to see if you like this project! and it makes me happy!
